name: Fly Car in City
description:
What a way to get out of traffic!! Fly Car in the City. Experience the all new way to fly in cars and escape the traffic. You have to go to the mall press the fly button and takeoff. you have to go home after tiring day at work press the fly button and evade all the traffic and reach home without a sweat. Explore the skies and seas and look at the view from building top.

This game comes with cool cars and smooth and efficient flying controls. Reach your destination quickly and in time. The new age is of flying cars and what better way than practicing before time and be an expert in flying cars.
